src.utils.network_generation.parse_network(species_list, reactions_list, init_species_no)[source]¶

Creates a chemical reaction network

Parameters

  • species_list – List of all species in the network

  • reactions_list – List of all reactions in the network with their reactants and products

  • init_species_no – Number of input species

Returns

networkx graph, list of all species

src.utils.pair_detection module¶

src.utils.pair_detection.set_domain_pairs(species)[source]¶

Puts all the pairs that are in this species into a dictionary with bond_id as keys and domains lists as values

Returns

src.utils.species_placement module¶

src.utils.species_placement.place_species(species)[source]¶

Performs initial placement of the domains in all strands of given species on a circle

Parameters

species – Reference to the Species object to place

Returns

Lower bound of the placed species, necessary for placing next species under it

src.utils.strand_modifier module¶

src.utils.strand_modifier.flip_pairings(crossings, bond, domain_pairs)[source]¶
src.utils.strand_modifier.set_loops_and_flip_domains(species, flip_domains)[source]¶

Finds the loops in a strand and flips the domains

Parameters

  • species – Species object

  • flip_domains – Boolean flag set in the ui, denotes if the domains should be flipped

Returns

src.utils.strand_permutation module¶

src.utils.strand_permutation.check_permutation(species, strands)[source]¶

Checks if this permutation of strands does not result in crossings in a circle diagram

Parameters

  • species – Species object

  • strands – Strand object to be checked

Returns

Number of domain flips, number of crossings, crossing pairs

src.utils.strand_permutation.get_permutation(species, permute, flip_strands, flip_domains)[source]¶

Sets the strands of the species in an order which minimizes the required number of flipped domains

Parameters

  • species – Species object

  • permute – Boolean flag set in the ui, denotes if strands should be permuted

  • flip_strands – Boolean flag set in the ui, denotes if strands should be flipped

  • flip_domains – Boolean flag set in the ui, denotes if domains should be should be flipped

Returns

True if non crossing permutation is found, False otherwise
